articles.headline: Wohoro Ndohho to Lead Montran Africa as Regional Executive Director
articles.description: Wohoro Ndohho is appointed Regional Executive Director for Montran Africa, leading payments infrastructure modernization from Nairobi.

articles.headline: World AIDS Day: A Call for Global Solidarity and Shared Responsibility
articles.description: Commemorating World AIDS Day with a look at progress and the path forward.
